Uses of Package
org.jogger.template

Packages that use org.jogger.template
org.jogger Entry point classes (such as Jogger and org.jogger.JoggerServer) used to configure and run a web application. 
org.jogger.http A decent HTTP request/response API. 
org.jogger.http.servlet An implementation of the HTTP request/response API that uses the Servlet API underneath. 
org.jogger.template Provides functionality to support template engines. 
org.jogger.test The testing infrastructure for Jogger applications. 
 

Classes in org.jogger.template used by org.jogger
TemplateEngine
          Provides an abstraction for loading and rendering templates.
 

Classes in org.jogger.template used by org.jogger.http
TemplateException
          Wraps any other exception thrown by TemplateEngine implementations.
